alert.note: Alert for Penuelas; Ponce (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 22 at 3:54AM ADT until May 22 at 5:15AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Penuelas and Ponce. * WHEN...Until 445 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 251 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated light to moderate rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
